MUST READ
name: Readify - Insights - Articles - Heartbleed: Considerations for Microsoft-centric organisations
caption: readify.net
description: There has been a lot of press coverage over the last week about Heartbleed. As the vulnerable library, OpenSSL, is predominantly used in Linux and open source environments, there hasn't been as much attention applied to those of us with Microsoft-centric investments.
